name: node-base-template
description: This is a template for a Node project with TypeScript and ES2015, using Mocha/Chai/Sinon for testing.
author: Jesse Squire

scripts.exec: npm run env/init -s -- npm run babel-node -s $npm_package_config_sourceEntryPoint
scripts.watch: npm run env/init -s -- npm run nodemon -s -- -e $npm_package_config_watchExtensions --watch $npm_package_config_sourcePathPattern --ignore "$npm_package_config_testFilePattern" --exec "npm run exec -s"
scripts.env/init: npm run cross-var -s -- npm run cross-env -s -- NODE_ENV=$npm_package_config_environment DEBUG=$npm_package_config_debugLogEnv
scripts.lint-src: npm run env/init -s -- npm run tslint -s -- --force --exclude $npm_package_config_testFilePattern
scripts.debug: npm run env/init -s -- npm run babel-debug -s -- --inspect=$npm_package_config_debugPort $npm_package_config_sourceEntryPoint
scripts.debug-break: npm run env/init -s -- npm run babel-debug -s -- --inspect-brk=$npm_package_config_debugPort $npm_package_config_sourceEntryPoint
scripts.debug-watch: npm run env/init -s -- npm run nodemon -s -- -e $npm_package_config_watchExtensions --watch $npm_package_config_sourcePathPattern --ignore "$npm_package_config_testFilePattern" --exec "npm run debug -s"
scripts.debug-break-watch: npm run env/init -s -- npm run nodemon -s -- -e $npm_package_config_watchExtensions --watch $npm_package_config_sourcePathPattern --ignore "$npm_package_config_testFilePattern" --exec "npm run debug-break -s"
scripts.build: npm run npm-run-all -s -- lint/enforce build/clean build/bundle/prod build/output/test
scripts.build-dev: npm run npm-run-all -s -- lint build/clean build/bundle/dev build/output/test
scripts.build-compile: npm run npm-run-all -s -- build/clean build/create build/test-compile
scripts.build-compile-src: npm run npm-run-all -s -- build/clean build/create build/compile-only
scripts.build/bundle/dev: npm run env/init -s -- npm run webpack -s -- --config $npm_package_config_devBundleConfig
scripts.build/bundle/prod: npm run env/init -s -- npm run webpack -s -- --config $npm_package_config_prodBundleConfig
scripts.build/compile-only: npm run env/init -s -- npm run babel -s -- src --ignore $npm_package_config_testPathPattern --out-dir $npm_package_config_buildOutputDir --source-maps
scripts.build/test-compile: npm run env/init -s -- npm run babel -s -- src --out-dir $npm_package_config_buildOutputDir --source-maps
scripts.build/output/test: npm run env/init -s -- npm run mocha -s -- --colors --recursive --reporter=progress "$npm_package_config_testBuildOutputPattern"
scripts.test: npm run env/init -s -- npm run istanbul -s -- npm run babel-mocha -s -- --require "./node_modules/@babel/register" --colors --recursive "$npm_package_config_testFilePattern"
scripts.test-debug: npm run env/init -s -- npm run babel-debug -s -- --inspect=$npm_package_config_debugPort ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --require "./node_modules/@babel/register" --colors --recursive "$npm_package_config_testFilePattern"
scripts.test-debug-break: npm run env/init -s -- npm run babel-debug -s -- --inspect-brk=$npm_package_config_debugPort ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --require "./node_modules/@babel/register" --colors --recursive "$npm_package_config_testFilePattern"
scripts.test-watch: npm run env/init -s -- npm run nodemon -s -- -e $npm_package_config_watchExtensions --watch $npm_package_config_sourcePathPattern --exec "npm run test -s"
scripts.test-compile: npm run npm-run-all -s -- test-build/test/clean test-build/test/create build/test/compile-only
